MiscMetabar 0.22

Heat tree from metacoder package using tax_table slot

Source: R/plot_functions.R
physeq_heat_tree.Rd

physeq_heat_tree(physeq, taxonomic_level = NULL, ...)

Arguments

physeq

(required): A phyloseq-class object

taxonomic_level

(Default: NULL): a vector of selected taxonomic level using their column numbers (e.g. taxonomic_level = c(1:7))

...

: Arguments parsed to heat_tree

Value

A plot

Author

Adrien Taudière

Examples

if (FALSE) {
data("GlobalPatterns")
GPsubset <- subset_taxa(
  GlobalPatterns,
  GlobalPatterns@tax_table[, 1] == "Bacteria"
)
GPsubset <- subset_taxa(
  GPsubset,
  rowSums(GPsubset@otu_table) > 1000
)
GPsubset <- subset_taxa(GPsubset, rowSums(is.na(GPsubset@tax_table)) == 0)

physeq_heat_tree(GPsubset,
  node_size = n_obs,
  node_color = n_obs,
  node_label = taxon_names,
  tree_label = taxon_names,
  node_size_trans = "log10 area"
)
}
